About

My name is Ryan Drost. I am a freelance Web Developer that lives in a Northern Suburb of Minneapolis, MN with my wife and 2 kids. When I am not developing I enjoy wood working and playing almost any sport. I would love the opportunity to make your website dream a reality.

I have 9+ years of development experience in various industries and technologies. I work with .NET, Ruby on Rails, Javascript (ReactJS, Angular and VueJS), AWS, Azure and many other technologies! If interested send me a message below!
